title: Nemesis
description: "How pleasant to meet Miss Marple again." -Literary Times Supplement  So pleasant in fact, she was the Anthony Award Winner for Best Series of the Century. Here she solves a crime that not only has no body, no weapon, and no suspects, but no evidence that a crime has even been committed. All Miss Marple has to go on is one single word: nemesis.
author: Agatha Christie
